message.body: Did you say you were going to make the fundraiser flyer? I forget exactly.
Yes, its half made already, i can get it to you soon
No worries I just forgot. I think that's super!
I think that i should make a facebook page rather than continuing the group, it will be farther reaching. Thoughts?
Go for it! Any way to link the two?
Check with lo and Phinn before you discontinue anything. Can I call you after 10?
Unfortunately theres no way to link the two other than inviting the group to "like" us. You can call but i may have to call back whenever we have a setbreak
